item.title: HP has released the HP Helion OpenStack Community Edition for free
item.description:
As part of its new HP Helion portfolio, HP is launching cloud products and services. These include: HP Helion OpenStack Community Edition: This commercially available OpenStack product line is delivered, tested, and supported by HP. This free edition, available now, is perfect for proofs of concept, pilot projects, and basic production workloads. HP’s OpenStack Technology Indemnification Program: This safeguards eligible customers who use HP Helion OpenStack code from claims of patent, copyright, and trade secret infringement by third parties...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hp-has-released-the-hp-helion-openstack-community-edition-for-free/
